survey_name: Corporate Sustainability Initiatives Employee Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and perception of the company's sustainability initiatives.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure awareness levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to assess awareness of specific initiatives.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important do you think sustainability initiatives are for our company?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to gauge perceived importance.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How important do you think sustainability initiatives are for our company?

questions.question_text: To what extent do you feel personally involved in our company's sustainability efforts?
questions.client_notes: Measure personal engagement with sustainability efforts.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: To what extent do you feel personally involved in our company's sustainability efforts?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather employee suggestions.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the company's communication about sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to assess satisfaction with communication.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the company's communication about sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Have you participated in any of the company's sustainability programs?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to measure participation rates.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Have you participated in any of the company's sustainability programs?

questions.question_text: If yes, which programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify popular programs.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection; include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: If yes, which programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in future sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure future engagement likelihood.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in future sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in sustainability initiatives?
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in sustainability initiatives?
